title: [COMPLETE] OCE Server restart @ 6:00am AEST, Tuesday 16th May
body:
Hi folks

At 6:00am AEST Tuesday morning (Sydney time), we'll be briefly restarting the OCE servers to fix some issues that we have had today with the store, clubs and player preferences.  Ranked will be turned off at 0430 ahead of the reboot, to ensure no games are being played when we shut down.  Players in normal games at that time will be disconnected.

Keep an eye on the [Service Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) page for any updates to the plan!

Cheers
Mindstar
